product_name: Nite Ize KeyRack Steel Key Organizer
long_description: The high-quality, stainless-steel Nite Ize KeyRack Steel lets you keep your keys organized and makes it simple to clip them on and off belt loops, zipper pulls or purse straps. Hook at the top of the stainless-steel holder has a carabiner-style gate that clips securely to anything with a loop or D-ring. Solid loop at the bottom holds 6 included #0.5 stainless-steel S-Biners that attach and release on either end. Quick on/off function of the S-Biners makes it easy to remove a single key to lend, leave for the dog sitter, take on a run or hike, etc.
short_description: The high-quality, stainless-steel Nite Ize KeyRack Steel lets you keep your keys organized and makes it simple to clip them on and off belt loops, zipper pulls or purse straps.
